attributes.action: Include people with high Covid-19 antibody levels in Covid-19 passport schemes
attributes.additional_details: This is a path to go back to normality, improve mental health and reopen the economy.
attributes.background: Any Covid-19 passport must include not only vaccinated people, but people that have had a recent test that shows they have a high level of Covid-19 antibodies.

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care
